sub_title: Consulting Director 180DC | Founder of ARÊTES | Charter Foundation Chair Rotaract Club of Tilburg
summary:
Top accomplishments of 2023 🚀:



- Winning Philips Hackathon 2023

- Consultant in 180DC Tilburg

- Personally inviting and successfully leading the facilitation of Sven Smit, the Director of McKinsey Global Institute at Tilburg University 

- Successfully leading the facilitation of Jeroen van der Veer, former CEO of Royal Dutch Shell and Chairman of Philips and ING at Tilburg University

- Successfully leading the facilitation of Margot Cooijmans, the Director of Philips Foundation at Tilburg University

- BSc Thesis on Internationalization Strategy & Firm Performance


Determined, proactive, and driven. Aspiring to become a top-class leader; loyalty, persistence, and a team spirit are the core values I bring to projects I work on. 

I am a big believer in getting things done while shooting for the stars. The balance between a mindset of limitless possibilities and being actively critical occurred to be very helpful in gaining speed while mitigating arising risks. This kind of face-paced complex environment is something I very enjoy. 

Strong curiosity makes me more of an allrounder keen on pursuing different tasks and understanding various fields from business and people to data, engineering, and sciences. What makes me genuinely excited about life are the hard times, the challenges, and the problems that people find impossible to solve; and solving them anyway. I believe in looking beyond the ordinary and living up to the extraordinary.

projects.title: Director of Philips Foundation, Margot Cooijmans: "Social Entrepreneurship"
projects.description: Together with two social entrepreneurs from healthcare, Margot Cooijmans discussed the background behind healthcare social entrepreneurship in Africa, and the activities of Philips Foundation when supporting social entrepreneurs around the world.

contributors.headline: Consulting Director 180DC | Founder of ARÊTES | Charter Foundation Chair Rotaract Club of Tilburg

projects.title: Global Leadership: Jeroen van der Veer sharing his 50+ years of experience
projects.description: After writing a book From A to B: lessons in leadership; together with prof Ronald de Jong, we invited Jeroen van der Veer to share his experience in a panel and Q&A discussion with students, reflecting on his experience as an ex-CEO and SB Chairman in global companies such as Shell, ING and Philips.

contributors.headline: Consulting Director 180DC | Founder of ARÊTES | Charter Foundation Chair Rotaract Club of Tilburg

projects.title: Director of McKinsey Global Institute, Sven Smit: "On the Cusp of a New Era"
projects.description:
Hosted by Ronald de Jong, distinguished professor of practice at TiU and Chairman of Philips Foundation; Sven Smit talked about the new era arising after an "earthquake" caused by the recent happenings since 2020, and its implications on where the world is heading. Followed by a 60min vivid Q&A with students, the Director of MGI shed new light on how the world adjusts itself to significant systematic changes.

Successfully organized an event with guest speaker Sven Smit (Chairman and Director of McKinsey Global Institute) at Tilburg University in cooperation with prof. Ronald de Jong, distinguished professor of practice at TiU and Chairman of Philips Foundation

contributors.headline: Consulting Director 180DC | Founder of ARÊTES | Charter Foundation Chair Rotaract Club of Tilburg

profile_positions.description: Part of the Leadership Team 180DC Tilburg. Co-creating project scope with a client and partnerships director. Managing project team- leaders and overseeing a successful execution of the projects. Maintaining contact with the client throughout the projects.
profile_positions.title: Consulting Director

profile_positions.description: Developing a consultancy department in order to fundraise money for charity donations under Rotaract Tilburg International Foundation and support 3rd world entrepreneurs. Creating two tracks  in Europe and Africa in order to maximize the social impact of our club and the Foundation. Team development, training arrangement, cold client reach-out and client management, project scope development.
profile_positions.title: Head of Consultancy

profile_positions.description: Founding member. Leading Foundation activities, building and leading the Foundation Committee. Estimating viability and financial management of projects; arranging grants. Co-creating the 1st strategic and financial annual planning. Active contact with Rotary Switzerland for grants, Foundation matters, and international project initiatives.
profile_positions.title: Charter Foundation Chair

profile_positions.description:
Start-up project creating tailored recruitment solutions and educational events with field experts. Selected to TiU Challenge Grand Finale – Top 8 business ready start-ups.

Key responsibilities: managing a team of 7 people, strategy development; extensive stakeholder management incl. TiSEM faculty and student associations.
profile_positions.title: Founder

profile_positions.description: Presenting improvements suggestions for the BSc IBA program to the academic director.
profile_positions.title: Sounding Board

profile_positions.description: Developing a brand expansion through venturing into new marketing channels as a source of revenue stream for Magic Effect Paint.
profile_positions.title: Student Consultant

profile_positions.description: Developing an HRM holistic solution for increasing seniors' turnover for salesforce multinational company Enxoo.
profile_positions.title: Student Consultant

profile_positions.description: Developing a marketing-sustainability strategy for HVC Group in a team from different fields under the SDG Challenge/Soapbox.
profile_positions.title: Student Consultant

profile_positions.description: Developing an expansion strategy for an electro-technical company focused on manufacturing electrical circuit board. Communicating with the manufacturer and project management.
profile_positions.title: Business Developer

profile_positions.description: Working in an international team operating the railport Tilburg and intermodal transport through the rail connection China-Netherlands.
profile_positions.title: Business Support

profile_positions.description: System specialist. Coordinating in/outbound together with team-leaders to ensure smooth running of the sort. Resolving delayed arrivals, overlooked containers during check-in. Assuring that all planned containers ran through the sort.
profile_positions.title: Control Room Operator Backup

profile_positions.description: Administration support to the owners with business activities. Communication expert.
profile_positions.title: Administration & sales support
